🌟How to Play🌟
There are seven piles of cards. The top card in each pile is visible with its suit facing up. If the card you want is hidden, you can move cards around until finding the wanted one. Then you drag the card and put it into the desired card slot. If one of the seven piles is cleared, you can place a K card in this empty pile.


If you have a solitaire card that's hidden, you can move solitaire cards around until you find places that you can hold and grab the desired solitaire card and, eventually, put it in the desired slot.

If you use all the solitaire cards in one of the seven piles, you may place a king in the empty space.
